title: Leadership Practical Competency Enhancement: Blended Mathematical Problem-Solving Based on the Trialogic Learning Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of undergraduate-level mathematics (calculus, linear algebra)
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can improve mathematical modeling skills by over 80% through real-case-based projects.
Learners can experience resolving complex mathematical problems through team collaboration using the Trialogic approach three or more times.
Learners can generate two or more knowledge-sharing outputs using digital tools (smartphone apps) in a blended learning environment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
